trans-unit.source: An abstract WCF extension class for specifying a custom discovery service or for getting the published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 抽象 WCF 扩展类，用于指定自定义发现服务或获取已发布的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from DiscoveryServiceExtension and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> method to return your custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: 从 DiscoveryServiceExtension 和重写派生一个类<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>方法以返回自定义发现服务。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your derived class to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> extensions that host your discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: 添加到派生的类<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>承载可发现服务的扩展。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> is called the behavior iterates through the extensions in the service host and looks for a DiscoveryServiceExtension.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>调用该行为循环访问服务主机中的扩展，并查找 DiscoveryServiceExtension。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If one is found its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> is called to get the custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到一个其<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>调用以获取自定义发现服务。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an extension is not found the default discovery service implementation is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用默认的发现服务实现不到的扩展。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"></xref> class.
Override this method to return your custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以返回自定义<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"></xref>实现。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown while opening the service host if this method returns `null`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>打开服务主机，如果此方法返回时引发`null`</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 获取已发布的终结点的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: The property should be accessed only after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> has successfully opened.
trans-unit.target: 应之后才访问该属性<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>成功打开。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> is in <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> is being generated and added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>处于<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>状态，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata>生成并将其添加到集合。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 已发布的终结点的只读集合。
